channel.title: How to get a short free domain
channel.description: I have been searching around, like most people for a good free domain. Most I found were: .c45.com, .mysite.com. But we all want one that looks like a .com one dont we? We'll I found one, and best of all its free. The sign up takes 3 minutes, and you get activated instantly. Check it out here: [url=http://www.co.cc/]Click Here[/url] [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnpmod.gif[/img] Multiple copies of one topic, multiple uses of a referral id, and so on.[/center]

item.title: How to get a short free domain
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Thanks for the heads up. I’ve kindly made the URL of that website you’re linking to look a little more like a .com domain by removing the ?id= portion.

Read full topic
item.source: How to get a short free domain
